remarks: The shorter-than relationship builds an order over pairs.  Remark 5.13 of [Schwabhauser] p. 42.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Jun-2019.)
statement:

legso.a $e |- E = ( .- " ( P X. P ) ) $.
legso.f $e |- ( ph -> Fun .- ) $.
legso.l $e |- .< = ( ( .<_ |` E ) \ _I ) $.
legso.d $e |- ( ph -> ( P X. P ) C_ dom .- ) $.
legso $p |- ( ph -> .< Or E ) $.
